summary: AI Engineer with over 5 years of experience leading next-gen solutions in SaaS. Spearheaded a 70% sales gain via AI innovations.

bullets.text: Lead AI initiatives to drive technological advancements and foster a culture of innovation within the organization, resulting in a 20% increase in project efficiency.
Spearheaded the development of cutting-edge AI solutions, enhancing product capabilities and market reach by over 50%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define AI strategy and integrate AI-driven features into existing products, reducing development time by 30%.
Developed an AI-driven platform that improved legal research time from days to minutes, boosting legal services efficiency by 200%.
Increased legal sector market penetration by 70% within 2 months through innovative Gen AI solutions.
Implemented AI strategies that aligned with business goals, resulting in strategic partner engagement growing by 35%.
Developed a hassle-free online insurance tool that eliminates the need for medical examinations, facilitating use by 25%.
Integrated cutting-edge technology to streamline user experience, reducing paperwork by 60% and simplifying insurance processes by 45%.
Contributed to the development of a platform that tailored insurance plans to individual needs, accessed by 90% of users via mobile.
Delivered world-class user experiences by building full-stack web and mobile applications using React, React Native, and Node.js, contributing to a 40% client satisfaction improvement.
Actively involved in UI design and implementation, translating client visions into functional and pleasing interfaces achieving a 35% increase in user engagement.
Facilitated client decision-making processes, ensuring alignment with project goals and fostering successful outcomes with a 50% reduction in project delays.
Successfully published and optimized multiple applications on the App Store and Google Play, increasing user base by 55%.
